description: Returns the detailed parameter list for a particular cache parameter group.

parameters.name: CacheParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of a specific cache parameter group to return details for.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The parameter types to return. Valid values: user | system | engine-default.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a marker is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 100 Constraints: minimum 20; maximum 100.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: Provides an identifier to allow retrieval of paginated results.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: A list of  Parameter instances.

nested_items.name: ParameterName
nested_items.description: The name of the parameter.

nested_items.name: ParameterValue
nested_items.description: The value of the parameter.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the parameter.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: The source of the parameter.

nested_items.name: DataType
nested_items.description: The valid data type for the parameter.

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: The valid range of values for the parameter.

nested_items.name: IsModifiable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether ( true) or not ( false) the parameter can be modified. Some parameters have security or operational implications that prevent them from being changed.

nested_items.name: MinimumEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The earliest cache engine version to which the parameter can apply.

nested_items.name: ChangeType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a change to the parameter is applied immediately or requires a reboot for the change to be applied. You can force a reboot or wait until the next maintenance window's reboot. For more information, see Rebooting a Cluster.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeTypeSpecificParameters
nested_items.description: A list of parameters specific to a particular cache node type. Each element in the list contains detailed information about one parameter.

nested_items.name: ParameterName
nested_items.description: The name of the parameter.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the parameter.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: The source of the parameter value.

nested_items.name: DataType
nested_items.description: The valid data type for the parameter.

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: The valid range of values for the parameter.

nested_items.name: IsModifiable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether ( true) or not ( false) the parameter can be modified. Some parameters have security or operational implications that prevent them from being changed.

nested_items.name: MinimumEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The earliest cache engine version to which the parameter can apply.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeTypeSpecificValues
nested_items.description: A list of cache node types and their corresponding values for this parameter.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeType
nested_items.description: The cache node type for which this value applies.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the cache node type.

nested_items.name: ChangeType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a change to the parameter is applied immediately or requires a reboot for the change to be applied. You can force a reboot or wait until the next maintenance window's reboot. For more information, see Rebooting a Cluster.
